data.name: Ragnarock
data.description:
Are you ready to rock? Ragnarock is a solo/multiplayer VR rhythm game in which you play a viking captain competing in a longship race. With your two hammers, crush the incoming runes in sync with epic viking music.

Ragnarock is easy to play, hard to master. Only the most experienced players will be able to collect all the gold medals, beat the high scores and sign their name on the leaderboard!

- VIKING MUSIC: Unleash the drummer in you and play to the epic rock and metal tracks of Alestorm, Gloryhammer, Saltatio Mortis, Wind Rose and many more!

- CROSS-PLATFORM MULTIPLAYER MODE (up to 6 players): Beat them all to finish in first place! In solo, you can also race against ghost ships to add some competition.

- MYTHOLOGICAL ENVIRONMENTS: Travel through stylized environments inspired by norse mythology.

- CUSTOM SONG SUPPORT

translations.long_description:
Пора начинать вечеринку? Ragnarock — это однопользовательская или многопользовательская ритм-игра с погружением в виртуальную реальность, где ты играешь в роли капитана корабля викингов. Твоя цель — выиграть гонку. Разбивай появляющиеся руны своими двумя молотами под эпическую музыку в духе викингов. Попадая точно по рунам, ты соберешь комбо, зарядишь энергией свои молоты и сможешь активировать ускорение!

Музыка викингов
Раскрой в себе таланты барабанщика и сыграй легендарные рок- и метал-композиции Alestorm, Gloryhammer, Wind Rose и не только.

Простой геймплей
в Ragnarock легко играть, но сложно прокачиваться. Разнообразие настроек уровней сложности поможет со временем повысить мастерство. Только самые опытные игроки смогут собрать все золотые медали, заработать рекордное количество очков и вписать свое имя в таблицу лидеров!

Многопользовательский режим
Сыграй в публичную или приватную игру (до 6 игроков), победи всех и выиграй гонку!
translations.short_description: Приведи свой корабль викингов к победе в нашей ритм-игре в условиях виртуальной реальности! Поднимай паруса и бросайся в бой с врагами, играя на барабанах в режиме многопользовательской игры под эпическую музыку: от кельтского рока до пауэр-метал в духе викингов. Рискнешь обойти всех и вписать свое имя в таблицу лидеров?

translations.long_description:
¿Listo para la acción? Ragnarock es un juego de ritmo VR solo/multijugador donde encarnarás a un capitán vikingo que participa en una carrera de barcos. Utiliza tus dos martillos para machacar las runas que llegan al ritmo de la música vikinga épica. ¡Sigue golpeando las runas con la máxima precisión para acumular energía en los martillos y lograr un combo que te permitirá activar un aumento de velocidad!

Música vikinga
Libera al batería que hay en ti y toca los temas épicos de rock y metal de Alestorm, Gloryhammer, Wind Rose y muchos más.

Un gameplay sencillo
Ragnarock es fácil de jugar y difícil de dominar. Varios parámetros de dificultad te permitirán mejorar a lo largo del tiempo. ¡Solo los jugadores más experimentados podrán hacerse con todas las medallas de oro, superar las mejores puntuaciones e inscribir su nombre en la tabla de clasificación!

Modo multijugador
Inicia una partida pública o privada (hasta 6 jugadores) y adelántalos a todos para llegar el primero!
translations.short_description: ¡Conduce tu drakkar hacia la victoria en este juego de ritmo de RV! Bate tus tambores al ritmo de música épica, desde rock celta hasta power metal vikingo, y zarpa para afrontar a tus adversarios en el modo multijugador. ¿Conseguirás adelantarlos y grabar tu nombre en lo alto de la clasificación?

translations.long_description:
Ready to Rock? Ragnarock ist ein VR-Rhythmusspiel für Einzel- oder Mehrspieler, in dem Du als Wikingerkapitän an einem Bootsrennen teilnimmst. Zertrümmere mit Deinen beiden Hammern Runen im Rhythmus epischer Wikingermusik. Je höher die Treffsicherheit, desto mehr Combo-Energie sammelst Du in Deinen Hammern, um einen Temposchub zu aktivieren.

Wikingermusik
Entfessele den Schlagzeuger in Dir und spiele zu epischem Rock und Metal-Klängen von Alestorm, Gloryhammer, Wind Rose und vielen anderen.

Gameplay für Solospieler
Ragnarock ist leicht zu spielen, aber schwer zu beherrschen. Vielseitige Schwierigkeitsgrade helfen Dir, mit der Zeit besser zu werden. Nur besonders erfahrene Spieler schaffen es, alle Goldmedaillen einzusammeln, hohe Punktezahlen zu erreichen und ihren Namen auf der Bestenliste zu verewigen.

Mehrspielermodus
Starte ein öffentliches oder privates Spiel (bis zu 6 Spieler) und schlage Sie alle, um auf dem ersten Platz zu enden!
translations.short_description: Steuere Dein Wikingerschiff in diesem VR-Spiel zum Klang der Trommeln und zum Sound epischer Musik, von Keltenrock bis Viking Power Metal, dem Sieg entgegen. Setze die Segel gegen Deine Rivalen im Mehrspielermodus. Sei schneller als sie und setze Deinen Namen an die Spitze der Bestenliste!

translations.long_description:
Prêt à t'éclater? Dans ce jeu de rythme VR solo/multijoueur, tu incarnes un capitaine viking participant à une course de drakkars. Avec tes deux marteaux, écrase les runes qui arrivent en rythme sur de la musique viking épique. Continue à frapper parfaitement pour accumuler de l'énergie combo dans tes marteaux, et tu pourras activer un boost de vitesse!

MUSIQUE VIKING
Libère le batteur en toi et joue sur les morceaux épiques de rock et métal d'Alestorm, Gloryhammer, Wind Rose et bien d'autres!

GAMEPLAY SIMPLE
Le jeu est facile à jouer, difficile à maîtriser. Plusieurs paramètres de difficulté t'aideront à t'améliorer au fil du temps. Seuls les joueurs les plus expérimentés pourront récolter toutes les médailles d'or, battre les meilleurs scores et signer leur nom en haut du classement!

MODE MULTIJOUEUR
Démarre une partie publique ou privée (jusqu'à 6 joueurs) et dépasse-les tous pour arriver premier! En solo, tu peux également affronter un bateau fantôme pour plus de compétition.
translations.short_description: Emmène ton drakkar vers la victoire dans ce jeu de rythme en VR! Frappe tes tambours sur de la musique épique, du rock celtique au power metal viking, et embarque contre tes adversaires dans le mode multijoueur. Pourras-tu les dépasser tous et graver ton nom en haut du classement?

translations.long_description:
Você está pronto para estourar? Ragnarock é um jogo de ritmo solo/multijogador VR em que você é um capitão viking competindo em uma corrida de navios. Com seus dois martelos, esmague as runas que surgem em sincronia com a música épica viking. Continue batendo bem nas runas para acumular energia de bónus em seus martelos, e você poderá ativar um boost de velocidade!

Música Vicking
Liberte o baterista em você e jogue ouvindo as faixas épicas de rock e metal de Alestorm, Gloryhammer, Wind Rose e muitos mais.

Jogabilidade simples
Ragnarock é fácil de jogar, difícil de dominar. Vários níveis de dificuldade irão ajudar você a melhorar ao longo do tempo. Apenas os jogadores mais experientes serão capazes de coletar todas as medalhas de ouro, bater as pontuações mais altas e assinar seu nome no ranking!

Modo Multijogador
Comece um jogo público ou privado (até 6 jogadores) e vença todos para terminar em primeiro lugar! No solo, você também pode correr contra um navio fantasma.
translations.short_description: Dirija o seu navio viking para a vitória neste jogo de ritmo VR! Bata seus tambores ao som de música épica, do rock celta ao viking power metal, e navegue contra seus rivais no modo multiplayer. Você vai poder ultrapassar todos eles e esculpir o seu nome no topo da classificação?

translations.long_description:
准备好摇滚了吗？《Ragnarock》是一款单人/多人 VR 节奏游戏，你将化身维京船长加入战船比赛。拿起你的两把鼓槌，随着史诗维京音乐节奏将飞来的符文击碎。不断完美击打符文击打来积累鼓槌的连击能量，随后即可激活加速！

维京音乐
释放你的鼓手天赋，奏响史诗摇滚金属乐章。Alestorm、Gloryhammer、Wind Rose，还有更多乐队作品等你来演奏。游戏充满着浓厚的激昂维京/凯尔特/海盗风格，将唤醒你身体里流动的维京力量！

简单的游戏玩法
《Ragnarock》沿袭街机游戏传统，上手容易、精通困难。只有节奏感才是过关斩将的唯一方法。想要赢得比赛，必须勤练使用技能的诀窍。多种难度设置将帮助你逐渐提升游戏水平。只有最老练的玩家才有能力集齐金牌，打破纪录，在排行榜上签写自己的名字！

多人模式
多人玩家对战模式可让玩家与好友或其他人进行实时对战。开启公开或私人游戏（至多 6 名玩家），将他们打得落花流水，勇夺第一！单人模式中可与幽灵船（代表你的最高分）进行对战，感受刺激竞赛体验。
translations.short_description: 进入这款 VR 游戏，扬帆维京战船驶向胜利！从凯尔特摇滚到维京力量金属——用你的鼓槌击打出史诗乐章，在多人模式中启航，与对手展开海战。你是否能够战胜众人，将自己的名字刻上排行榜之巅？

translations.long_description:
Sei pronto/a per un po’ d’azione? Ragnarock è un gioco ritmico in realtà virtuale in modalità single player/multiplayer, in cui impersoni un capitano vichingo che compete in una gara tra navi. Con i due martelli, distruggi le rune che si avvicinano al ritmo dell'epica musica vichinga. Continua a colpire alla perfezione le rune, per accumulare energia combo nei tuoi martelli e potrai attivare un incremento della velocità!

Musica vichinga
Scatena il batterista che c’è in te e suona le epiche tracce rock e metal di Alestorm, Gloryhammer, Wind Rose e molti altri.

Gameplay semplice
Ragnarock è facile da giocare, difficile da padroneggiare.  I vari livelli di difficoltà ti aiuteranno a migliorare nel tempo. Solo i giocatori più esperti riusciranno a raccogliere tutte le medaglie d'oro, a battere i punteggi più alti e a mettere il proprio nome nella classifica!

Modalità multiplayer
Avvia una partita pubblica o privata (fino a 6 giocatori) e battili tutti, per aggiudicarti il primo posto!
translations.short_description: Porta alla vittoria la tua nave vichinga, in questo videogioco ritmico in realtà virtuale! Suona i tamburi al ritmo della musica epica, dal rock celtico al viking power metal, e affronta i tuoi rivali in modalità multiplayer. Batterai tutti e porterai il tuo nome in cima alla classifica?

changelog.change_log: Fixed a crash that could occur on game start

Jonathan Young RAID - Update 2.3.0

 - Added Jonathan Young RAID DLC with 6 songs, Kraken boat and Kraken hammer
 - Added shortcut on vote panel to vote for the same song as someone else 
 - Fixed issues with podium when a player joins/leaves the game
 - Fixed disappearing beards on podium

Patch 2.2.1  
- Fixed a bug preventing the Latency setting from being saved properly  
- Restored bHaptics functionnality

2.2.0 - October update
- 2 new songs: Korpiklaani - Sanaton Maa and Northtale - Only Human
- Limited-time Halloween menus and unlockable Hel hammer (until Nov 5, 2023)
- Podium scene at the end of a multiplayer race (with animations and emotes)
- Changed the way to send emotes in multiplayer (now using drums and shields)
- Added "Random" button in song selector to randomly choose a song in the current album
- Reskinned ghost ships with animated skeleton crew and captain
- Added full body animated avatars for PC players in multiplayer

Patch 2.1.3:
- Fixed a bug preventing DLC songs to become available in multiplayer when a player owns them
- Fixed a bug that caused custom songs to be removed from Favorites

Patch 2.1.2
- Fixed a save corruption issue that could cause a crash on start
- Fixed a song loading issue that could cause a crash
- Fixed a texture loading issue to improve UI legibility
- Optimized level loading on Sabaton level to avoid freezes
- In calibration room, clarify the drum to hit
- In changing room, new hammer box is now immediately visible
- Bigger glow on changing room door when there is something new in it

Patch 2.1.1
- Added "Lightning VFX" adjustment in Graphics settings
- Fix Hellfest map performances
- Fix limited number of public multiplayer sessions
- Fix pause menu not working in multi after the first song
- Fix some translations
- Fix beat lines not spawned when resuming from pause after bpm changed

Changelog 2.1.0

- Added 5 new achievements that unlock 5 new hammers (easier to achieve and more rewarding for beginners):
  - My Pretty: Get bronze medals on all the levels of all the songs from Volume 1
  - My Shiny: Get silver medals on all the levels of all the songs from Volume 1
  - Bronze Age: Get a bronze medal and nothing more on any song (OST only)
  - Silver Bullet: Get a silver medal and nothing more on any song (OST only)
  - Gold Digger: Get a gold medal (OST only)
- Updated the aspect of the “My Precious” hammer to match new hammers
- Added calibration room to help calibrate latency
- Multiplayer filter now doesn’t apply in private games (anyone who has the code can join)
- [Fix] Fixed Favorites disappearing
- [Fix] Fixed sound bug when hovering stats
- [Fix] Fixed leaderboard not updated correctly at the end of a song
- [Fix] Fixed beat lines not synchronized with visual latency
- [Fix] Added platform icon in local leaderboards
- [Fix] Don’t apply rune color setting in tutorial
- [Fix] Fixed Saves could become corrupted and cause crash on opening game

Changelog 2.1.0

- Added 5 new achievements that unlock 5 new hammers (easier to achieve and more rewarding for beginners):
  - My Pretty: Get bronze medals on all the levels of all the songs from Volume 1
  - My Shiny: Get silver medals on all the levels of all the songs from Volume 1
  - Bronze Age: Get a bronze medal and nothing more on any song (OST only)
  - Silver Bullet: Get a silver medal and nothing more on any song (OST only)
  - Gold Digger: Get a gold medal (OST only)
- Updated the aspect of the “My Precious” hammer to match new hammers
- Added calibration room to help calibrate latency
- Multiplayer filter now doesn’t apply in private games (anyone who has the code can join)
- [Fix] Fixed Favorites disappearing
- [Fix] Fixed sound bug when hovering stats
- [Fix] Fixed leaderboard not updated correctly at the end of a song
- [Fix] Fixed beat lines not synchronized with visual latency
- [Fix] Added platform icon in local leaderboards
- [Fix] Don’t apply rune color setting in tutorial
- [Fix] Fixed Saves could become corrupted and cause crash on opening game

Sabaton RAID Update - 2.0.0

New Sabaton RAID:
- Resist and Bite *(Levels 1/5/10)*  
- Seven Pillars of Wisdom *(Levels 2/7/10)*  
- To Hell and Back *(Levels 2/5/8)*  
- Night Witches *(Levels 3/6/8)*  
- Steel Commanders *(Levels 3/6/9)*  
- Stormtroopers *(Levels 3/6/9)*  
- an epic battlefield environment  
- a new eagle longship  
- a new hammer (unlocked by playing all 6 songs from the DLC)  

New :
-  "Advanced settings > Leaderboard filter" to mix PC and VR leaderboards or not (separate by default)  
- "Advanced settings > Multiplayer filter" to allow private/public multiplayer games between PC and VR players (mixed by default)  
- Icon for the player's gameplay (controller, One Key One Drum, or VR) on the leaderboards and race scores  
- Favorites moved to the left of the albums instead of last on the right  
- Hide wooden medal panel on song levels that have never been played  
- Updated Gifs in tutorial  
- [Fix] Fixed bug on the Favorites when deleting a custom song that was in the favorites

Update 1.8 - Patch 1

- Fixes a crash that could occur when disconnected from a multiplayer session

Ragnarock A Doodle Doo Update

- 2 new songs for free: "Powersnake" by Brothers of Metal and "Metal United" by Majestica
- Temporary Easter lobby with extra chicken! (until April 14th)
- New Chicken Hammer unlockable from the Easter Lobby (by finding a not-so-hidden interaction)
- New WebSocket feature to send/receive gameplay info (hits, songs played, popup messages, hammer change...). This is made to allow third-party developers to create their own tools to interact with the game (during streams for example)

Update 1.7 - Patch 1

- Added missing description translations for the Nuclear Blast Hammer
- Fixed: after unlocking a new hammer, it is now properly auto-selected
- Fixed: after purchasing a song or a pack, the lock icon on the category wheel properly disappears

Nuclear Blast Update (V1.7)

New DLC available: Nuclear Blast RAID

Enjoy this new epic journey on songs by amazing bands of the Nuclear Blast Records label, such as Beast in Black, Eluveitie, Battle Beast, and more. Discover 9 new tracks with different music styles, collect a special new longship, and unlock the unique Nuclear Blast Hammer by playing all songs from the pack!  
The pack includes:

 - Battle Beast - "Eye of the Storm" - [04:26] - Difficulty 3/5/7
 - Beast In Black - "One Night in Tokyo" - [03:07] - Difficulty 2/7/9
 - Eluveitie - "Ambiramus" - [02:53] - Difficulty 2/4/8
 - Epica - "Abyss of Time - Countdown to Singularity" - [05:20] - Difficulty 3/6/9
 - Equilibrium - "Revolution" - [04:16] - Difficulty 4/7/9
 - Equilibrium - "Rise Again" - [03:51] - Difficulty 4/6/8
 - Korpiklaani - "Vodka" - [02:59] - Difficulty 2/5/7
 - Korpiklaani - "A Man with a Plan" - [02:59] - Difficulty 3/5/9
 - Symphony X - "Nevermore" - [05:30] - Difficulty 3/7/10
 - New "Nuclear Blast" Longship skin - Sail aboard the Nuclear Moose! Unlocks by acquiring any of the songs above.
 - New "Nuclear Blast" Hammer skin - Unlocks by playing all 9 songs above at least once.

Reminder: Please note DLC songs can be shared in public/private multiplayer.

Fixes

- More equalized sound volume on secondary in-game sounds (drums, vikings, medals...). Remember those can always be turned down in the audio settings.

Update 1.6 - Patch 3
 - Restored music volume to match previous update level

Note from the team: 
During development, we had sound issues on other platforms that drove us to rework the whole system. That changed the overall audio mix on the game, and therefore the game feel that our players were used to. We apologize for that, and we restored the audio mix to what it was before. We will continue working to offer you the best game experience possible across all platforms, while preserving the loudness and power expected from a viking metal themed game!

Update 1.6 - Patch 2
- [Fix] Restored preview sound quality (was downmixed to mono)
- [Fix] Restored song volume to mix properly with other gameplay sounds like drums
- [Fix] Longship shields color/texture now display properly
- [Fix] Front panel when starting a multiplayer game now properly shows if the song is available
- [Fix] Front panel when starting a multiplayer game now properly disappears when the song starts

Update 1.6 - Patch 1
- [Fix] Song sound was downmixed to mono
- [Fix] Fix dates on new songs to have the correct filter by date

Ragnarock v1.6 (Halloween 2022 Update)

Halloween event
 - Halloween-themed lobby decoration
 - Limited-time secret event to unlock the Hel hammer (for those who missed last year's Halloween). Available only until Nov 13th!

New content
 - 2 new songs for free : "Niemi" by Korpiklaani (Level 3/6/9), and "Out Of Control" by Bad Situation (Level 2/4/7)
 - New Avatar customization booth now available in Changing Room (also controls crew/shield colors). WARNING: Your previous avatar options will be reset and a random avatar will be assigned to each profile. Customize them in the Changing Room!
 - New "Dark Empty" environment

New features
 - You can now share RAID songs in multiplayer races! (If someone in the party owns them, all players can play them)
 - New Search button in song selector (searches in current volume, in titles and artists' names)
 - New animation for unlocking hammers (break a gift box with your hammer)
 - Local profiles and settings are now cloud saved if an internet connection is available (except for space calibration settings)
 - Show mapper's name for custom songs (on Start panel and in song list on hover)

Fixes
 - Limit number of authorized pauses to 5 for leaderboard scores (After more than 5 pauses, the score is not sent to the leaderboards)
 - Compute perfect notes ratio only on spawned notes (if player started during a song)
 - Hellfest crowd sounds now fade when previewing songs in song selector
 - Moved all remaining sounds through FMOD plugin
 - Fix empty friends leaderboard's text from "Error" to "No players yet"
 - Fix particles that could fall on player in Muspelheim's lava field
 - Clean unused files to reduce game file size
 - Fix saturated sound when casting/mirroring

Update 1.5 - Patch 2
- Fixed a crash on accessing Favorites
- Fixed Volume 2 songs sometimes unavailable in multiplayer

Update 1.5 - Patch 1

- Fix selecting a drakkar not owned
- Fixed a freeze happening a few minutes after launching the game (depended on the number of custom songs)
- Fix focus last song played in song list when in subfolders
- Fix favorite duplicate if custom song changed folder
- UI fixes
